department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 29, 2023 at 1400 EST. All bids submitted after 1400 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), Stony Mountain Institution in Stony Mountain, Manitoba has a requirement for the supply and delivery of Nicorette gum, on an as and when needed basis. The period of the Standing Offer is from April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2025, with option to extend the term for an additional 2 one year periods, from April 1, 2025 to March 31, 2026, and from April 1, 2026 to March 31, 2027.
full_summary:
================

### 21510-240001 - Nicorette Gum Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Title**: 21510-240001 - Nicorette Gum
* **Reference Number**: WS4272611279-Doc4272643773
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-08
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-29T14:00:00 (AMENDMENT: Closing time has been adjusted to 14:00 EST)
* **Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-01
* **Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31 (with option to extend to 2026 and 2027)

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: The tender is open to bidders who have a trade agreement with the Canadian government.

#### Contract Details

* **Contractor Information**: Supplies and delivery of Nicorette gum as and when needed
* **Contract Period**: 2024-03-31 (with option to extend to 2026 and 2027)
* **Delivery Region**: Manitoba

#### End User Information

* **End User**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* **End User Address**: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON, K1P0P9, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Douglas Rachinski, SPAC/PSPC
* **Contact Email**: [douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Documents

* **Tender Notice**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17953115?extsite=MTc5NTMxMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
